blog.title: 杜蕾斯的文案水平又回来了？
blog.description: 到2020年中期，回头看看老海报司机杜蕾斯（Durex），可以说是颇有成效！除了维持社交媒体平台的日常运营外，节日和热点也没有减少。数量增
blog.content: {"blocks":[{"key":"foo","text":"到2020年中期，回头看看“老海报司机”杜蕾斯（Durex），可以说是颇有成效！","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e3t5t","text":"除了维持社交媒体平台的日常运营外，节日和热点也没有减少。数量增加，质量提高。在海报表现上，杜蕾斯的水平可以说在视觉上得到了提高，色调得到了稳定，表达形式变得多样化，文案与图片之间的合作更加默契，我再次成为粉丝！","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e0dgt","text":"01","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":2,"style":"BOLD"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5s1k","text":"喜欢热点的杜蕾斯（Durex）：热点不多，性能出色","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":25,"style":"BOLD"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3iqo9","text":"2020年上半年，杜蕾斯（Durex）并没有很多热点，但是他的表现很一般。推出新的iPhone SE；微信深色模式； NASA站立式扫帚挑战；火遍网络的小瓶子...每一张海报都有简洁的文字和图片中的深刻含义。杜蕾斯小猎犬确实有自己的一套，即使您删除LOGO，也可以猜到。","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"18m6o","text":"外出时要注意安全。","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ai0is","text":" “恋爱中的哪些小细节会让您感到安全？”","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cuk9g","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":4}],"data":{}},{"key":"dvre6","text":"02","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":2,"style":"BOLD"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d2f","text":"庆祝节日的杜蕾斯（Durex）：品牌说话，三种观点都非常积极","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":30,"style":"BOLD"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8930m","text":"难以预料的热点很难预测，但是可以预先准备无法被闪电击败的节日。今年上半年，杜蕾斯为近20个国际和国内节日准备了海报。图片不仅表现力强，而且每张海报还传达了品牌的积极价值。最令人印象深刻的是3月8日妇女节。杜蕾斯（Durex）大力为女性代言并赢得了许多赞誉。杜蕾斯（Durex）在过去六个月中制作的节日海报实际上非常令人兴奋。让我们一起查看它们！","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a74bk","text":"妇女节","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":3,"style":"BOLD"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"be4s7","text":"妇女节是3月8日妇女节＃做你自己。","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7n24l","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":25}],"data":{}},{"key":"t9au","text":"03","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":2,"style":"BOLD"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aulro","text":"喜欢推产品的杜蕾斯（Durex）：不同的卖点和不同的风格","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":28,"style":"BOLD"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cnbtm","text":"去年8月，杜蕾斯（Durex）迎来了90周年的全新升级，不仅告别了过去，而且还预示着品牌营销营销的改组。最直观的表达是杜蕾斯产品海报。","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ckvo","text":"在整个上半年中，尽管杜蕾斯（Durex）喜欢推销产品，但可以说海报风格有所不同。技术感，抽象艺术，新鲜度小，模仿名画……每个卖点都有不同的风格。即使它可以给观众带来新鲜感，但它会不断变化，很难创建独特的可识别性。","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6i1p9","text":"今晚，“藏就行”。","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8knl6","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":35}],"data":{}},{"key":"1obrd","text":"不难看出杜蕾斯开启了新的篇章。","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6jfuo","text":"诚然，杜蕾斯新形象的出现从一开始就遭到了许多批评和批评，但一年多以后，杜蕾斯在海报设计上变得越来越稳定。","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"10s0e","text":"尽管词汇量发生了变化，但规模很小，玩耍的人少了，但最重要的品牌价值没有改变。杜蕾斯作为计划生育产品中最具影响力的品牌之一，在大大小小的营销传播活动中始终坚持积极的三种观点，不仅坚持品牌价值和品牌理念，而且还承担着责任。社会层面和使命。","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d7ccp","text":"因此，在上半年阅读了杜蕾斯的这些精选海报之后，您是否也被其重新散布过？","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d0bg5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"src":"https://oss.faycz.com/8590f53b-f95d-489f-b188-e0ef31464a1dfay.png","style":{"textAlign":"center"}}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"src":"https://oss.faycz.com/88beb5ce-f788-4b1a-b62f-dd4fd5974562fay.jpeg","style":{"textAlign":"center"}}},"2":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"src":"https://oss.faycz.com/ff1b7da3-ca73-47a3-8d26-f2476284c359fay.jpeg","style":{"textAlign":"center"}}},"3":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"src":"https://oss.faycz.com/7f739935-6b01-4c65-9eea-27b7ab8e60ecfay.jpeg","style":{"textAlign":"center"}}},"4":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"src":"https://oss.faycz.com/443f45b1-04d5-4a8b-90c6-4161d9957781fay.jpeg","style":{"textAlign":"center"}}},"5":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"src":"https://oss.faycz.com/97334c97-cc2d-418e-952a-69358fa762ddfay.jpeg","style":{"textAlign":"center"}}},"6":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"src":"https://oss.faycz.com/a33a6b59-f61c-4993-8366-123209ade09bfay.jpeg","style":{"textAlign":"center"}}},"7":
